branchCategory.name: 10/11/21/22-C(D)U Double Acting, Single Rod, Clean Room
branchCategory.description: <p>The series 10/11/21/22-CU clean series, single rod, double acting free mount cylinder saves space and allows  direct and precise mounting. Clean series includes a relief port that help in removing rod area contaminants. Options include auto-switch capabilities, free mount choices, recessed switch mounting grooves and rubber bumpers standard.</p>
